import pandas as pd
import pyspark.pandas as ps
import json
import numpy as np
from datetime import datetime
import calendar
import warnings

import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T

def load_and_process_solum_subscriptions(subscription_path):

    subscription_df = spark.read.json(subscription_path)
    subscription_df = subscription_df.withColumnRenamed('id', 'SubId')
    subscription_df = subscription_df.withColumn('id', F.monotonically_increasing_id())

    try:
        subscription_df = subscription_df.withColumn('tags', F.from_json(F.col('tags')))
    except:
        print('Already a json file')

    # Expanding the tags list into separate columns
    subscription_df = subscription_df.withColumn('SubscriptionWBS', F.col('tags.WBS'))
    subscription_df = subscription_df.withColumn('SubscriptionServiceNow-App', F.col('tags.ServiceNow-App'))
    subscription_df = subscription_df.drop('tags')

    # Dropping unnecessary columns and setting the schema
    columns_to_keep = ['SubId', 'SubscriptionWBS', 'SubscriptionServiceNow-App']
    subscription_df = subscription_df.select(columns_to_keep)

    return subscription_df

def load_and_process_servicenow_subscriptions(subscription_path):
    subscription_df = spark.read.format('parquet').load(subscription_path)
    
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.select('SubscriptionId', 'OperationalWBS', 'ApplicationName')
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.withColumnRenamed('SubscriptionId', 'SubId')
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.where(subscriptions_df.SubId != '')
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.withColumnRenamed('OperationalWBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.withColumnRenamed('ApplicationName', 'SubscriptionServiceNow-App')
    return subscriptions_df

def load_and_process_applications(application_path):
    application_df = spark.read.format('parquet').load(application_path)
    application_df = application_df.withColumn('AppID', F.col('AppID').cast("int"))
    return application_df

def write_output_file(cost_df, destinationFilename):

    cost_df = cost_df.drop('id', 'AdditionalInfo') 
    print('start to write to container')
    cost_df.write.format('parquet').mode('overwrite').option('path', destinationFilename).save()
    print('File write complete!')

print(f'fromDate: {fromDate}')
print(f'toDate: {toDate}')
report_types = ['ActualCost', 'AmortizedCost']

print(f"------ From: {fromDate}, To: {toDate} -----------")

for report_type in report_types:

    print(f"------ {report_type} -----------")
    formatted_to_date = f'{toDate[0:4]}-{toDate[4:6]}-{toDate[6:]}'
    formatted_to_date = '2021-11-30' if str(formatted_to_date) < '2021-11-30' else formatted_to_date

    print(f'longToDate: {formatted_to_date}')
    date_range = fromDate + '-' + toDate
    print(f'dateRange: {date_range}')

    cost_source_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/exports/monthly/ACMMonthly{report_type}/{date_range}/ACMMonthly{report_type}_{date_range}.parquet'
    cost_target_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/exports/monthly/ACMMonthly{report_type}/{date_range}/Extended_v3_ACMMonthly{report_type}_{date_range}.parquet'

    # Load subcsription data
    solum_subscription_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/subscriptions/subscriptions_{formatted_to_date}.json'
    servicenow_subscription_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/subscriptions/servicenow/{formatted_to_date}-optimized.parquet'

    try:
        subscription_df = load_and_process_servicenow_subscriptions(servicenow_subscription_path)
    except:
        subscription_df = load_and_process_solum_subscriptions(solum_subscription_path)

    # Load application data
    application_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/applications/ServiceNow-Application-List-Extended.parquet'
    application_df = load_and_process_applications(application_path)

    # Process cost data
    cost_df = spark.read.format('parquet').load(cost_source_path)
    cost_df = transform_cost_data(cost_df)
    cost_df = cost_df.withColumn("ResourceLocation", F.lower(F.trim(F.regexp_replace(F.col('ResourceLocation'), "\s+", ""))))
    cost_df = combine_subscriptions_and_applications(cost_df, subscription_df, application_df)
    write_output_file(cost_df, cost_target_path)
    print(' ')
